mapper.sql: id, banner, page_title AS pageTitle, can_share AS canShare, scene, card_list AS cardList, url, page_id AS pageId, status, publicId, endDate, cardName, state
mapper.select: select id, banner, page_title, can_share, scene, card_list, url, page_id, status from t_wx_card_shelves where publicId=#{publicId} and state=1 and endDate > #{endDate}
select id, banner, page_title, can_share, scene, card_list, url, page_id, status from t_wx_card_shelves where id=#{id}
select count(id) from t_wx_card_shelves where publicId=#{publicId} order by id desc
